description: Turn the humble bagel into something special with these delightful Apple pie bites – perfect for the littlies or when you crave a fresh treat.
name: Apple Bagel Bites Recipe | Woolworths
recipeCategory: Kids light meal & snack,Fresh Food Kids
recipeIngredient: 2 Woolworths bagels, cut each into three rounds
2 Granny Smith apples, cored, cut into 1cm pieces

recipeInstructions.text: Preheat oven to 220°C/200°C fanforced. Line a large baking tray with baking paper. Mix 2 tsp honey with 2 tbs hot water. Brush honey mixture over 1 side of bagels and sprinkle with 1 tbs cinnamon. Place on tray and bake for 10 minutes until golden brown. Cut each round into quarters.
Meanwhile, combine apple with lemon juice, vanilla, and remaining honey and cinnamon in a large bowl.
Top each piece of bagel with 1 tbs yoghurt and apple mixture. Serve.
